definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: Its charter business, operated largely by its Lauda Air subsidiary, also could be cut by half.
sentences.chinese: 其子公司勞達航空的包機業務，也可能被縮減一半。

sentences.english: The Salbes company is a subsidiary of JiuDa Salt Group.
sentences.chinese: 索貝斯公司系久大集團下屬子公司。

sentences.english: Have you ever served in any relevant companies of Fubon Financial Group?
sentences.chinese: 是否曾至富邦金控相關子公司任職過？

sentences.english: Yike Machinery Co. , Ltd. of Singapore and construction of wholly-owned subsidiary of China Group.
sentences.chinese: 艾柯機械有限公司是新加坡建和集團中國獨資子公司。

sentences.english: AT&S is the subsidiary of Austria AT&S in Mainland China.
sentences.chinese: 奧特斯則是奧地利AT&S的國內子公司。

sentences.english: It is one of the subsidiaries headed by the Yountong Group.
sentences.chinese: 公司成立於2003年，是永通集團旗下子公司之一。

sentences.english: Doing so, though, could push away other vendors, such as Samsung Electronics Co.
sentences.chinese: 不過這樣做將會趕走其他授權商，如三星電子公司。

sentences.english: Both companies are subsidiaries of United Kingdom-based Imperial Tobacco Group.
sentences.chinese: 這兩家公司都是位於英國的帝國菸草集團的子公司。

sentences.english: The company has decided to amalgamate with the parent firm.
sentences.chinese: 這家子公司已決定和母公司合併。

sentences.english: Your company is a Sino-American joint venture with many subsidiaries all over world.
sentences.chinese: 貴公司是中美合資企業，在世界各地有很多家子公司。

sentences.english: All liability insurance policies for directors and officers of the Company and its subsidiaries.
sentences.chinese: 公司及其子公司的董事和主要領導人的責任保險計劃。

sentences.english: The recording currency of the Company and most of its subsidiaries is Renminbi.
sentences.chinese: 本公司及絕大多數子公司的記賬本位幣爲人民幣。

sentences.english: Kande Hotel Management Co. , Ltd. is a subsidiary company of the Dazhong Group.
sentences.chinese: 康帝酒店管理有限公司是大中集團之子公司。

sentences.english: Company D's board of directors instructed its two subsidiaries does not compliance with the regulation.
sentences.chinese: 戊公司的董事會對其兩家子公司的指示不符合規定。

sentences.english: Samsung Electronics Co. started a video contest based on the torch relay theme.
sentences.chinese: 三星電子公司以火炬傳遞爲主題，舉辦視頻大賽。

sentences.english: Publicis is one of the international networks of Publicis Groupe, the world's fourth largest communications group.
sentences.chinese: 陽獅是世界第四大廣告集團，陽獅集團的子公司之一。

definition: to own a controlling number of shares in a company
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
